existing_features.title: Update the existing menu item named "Mineral Water" in `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts` so its displayed price reflects an M.R.P. of ₹20 (i.e., the price badge for "Mineral Water" must show ₹20 in the UI and in global search results).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Mineral Water item M.R.P. to ₹20
